patterns: give me a general idea about the school
give me an introduction about ensa berrechid
responses:
National School of Applied Sciences of Berrechid (ENSA Berrechid) is a public engineering school. Belongs to the Hassan 1st University of Settat and part of the ENSA network of Morocco. ENSA Berrechid has for a mission to train engineers and specialists in scientific and technical disciplines going through 2 years of integrated preparatory education then another 3 years to get an engineering degree. 
 By a ministerial decree of May 11, 2018, EST Berrechid has evolved into becoming ENSA Berrechid on the academic year 2018/2019.
API or integrated preparatory years are a common core formation that initiates students to the next phase which is the three years of speciality engineering.

patterns: what engineering specialities does ensab have
responses:
Here is the list of engineering specialities that you can find at Ensa Berrechid: 
1) Aeronautical engineering.
2) BigData and information systems engineering.
3) Computer Science engineering.

Aeronautical engineering is the design, production, testing and maintenance of aircraft, aerospace vehicles and their systems. This includes conventional fixed-wing aircraft as well as helicopters, spacecraft and drones.

Information systems are a group of networks and processes that are interconnected to enable the collection, filtering, processing, creation and transmission, and delivery of data. They involve both hardware and software and Big data is a field that treats ways to analyze, systematically extract information from, or otherwise deal with data sets that are too large or complex to be dealt with by traditional data-processing application softwares
Computer Science is the study of computers and computational systems. Computer scientists design and analyze algorithms to solve programs and study the performance of computer hardware and software.

patterns: who is in charge of the school?
who is the principal of the school?
responses:
The school director at ENSAB is Mr. ABDELMOUMEN TABYAOUI, here is his LinkedIn account: 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/tabyaoui-abdelmoumen-159284a0/

The ENSA Berrechid curriculum begins with the first two years common to all students. These two years are assured by the preparatory classes to the engineering cycle which makes the link between highschool graduation and engineering degree graduation which gives you an idea of it's importance in this cursus. Then we have the final three years of a specialized engineering formation that concludes with an end of studies project which is the fruit of a 4 to 6 months internship in the formation speciality.
